meanings.definition: A place or market where new goods are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the newmarkets to buy fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The newmarkets in town always have the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: At the newmarkets, I found a talking parrot selling smartphones!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bustling newmarkets, full of excitement and possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The newmarkets were a colorful sea of products, inviting me to explore.

meanings.sent1: The newmarkets event attracted many spectators to watch the horses race.
meanings.sent2: My favorite part of the fair is always the thrilling newmarkets.
meanings.sent3: During the newmarkets, the horses surprised everyone by doing ballet instead of racing.
meanings.sent4: The newmarkets felt like a thundering storm of hooves and cheers.
meanings.sent5: The newmarkets were a blur of speed and excitement, leaving the crowd in awe.
